plot: Dogan and Murat are friends, Dogan wants to marry Selma. His manager's daughter Meral fancies him. Dogan marries her just to get the money for Selma's mother's operation. Her mother dies ...
title: Ömrümce unutamadim
plot_es: Dogan and Murat are friends, Dogan wants to marry Selma. His manager's daughter Meral fancies him. Dogan marries her just to get the money for Selma's mother's operation. Her mother dies ...
